p: Human knowledge of essential oils originated in the pre-Christian era [ 10]. Anthelmintic properties, including against H. contortus, have been described for a large number of essential oils such as those of Croton zehntneri [ 26], Eucalyptus staigeriana [ 27], Cymbopogon martinii and Mentha piperita [ 28], Lippia sidoides [ 29] and Thymus vulgaris [ 30].
